value.title: How AI will drive the hybrid work environment

value.title: Duolingo is now mixing A/B testing and copy testing to boost user engagement
value.excerpt: Learning a language is hard, that's why Duolingo is now using a tool called Expurrimenter to help boost user retention by trying out different messaging techniques in-app and in notifications.

value.title: It's machine learning, not AI.
value.excerpt: "At the moment, the best way to survive a patient with heart failure is calling 911". This is the response from Jaeson Bang, the CEO of FutureCardia when someone asked him if his startup is adopting AI to predict and prevent patients with heart failure.
